home.integrateText: Mind Studio是一套基于华为昇腾AI处理器开发的AI全栈开发平台，提供了自定义算子的开发，网络层的网络移植、优化和分析等功能，另外在业务引擎层提供了一套可视化的AI引擎拖拽式编程服务，内置了丰富的高性能算子库，极大的降低了AI应用程序的开发门槛。
home.help: 帮助开发者降低开发难度和运营成本，加速应用上市
home.built: 内置丰富高性能算子库，多种开发、调试、调优和部署工具
home.structure: 构建面向各行各业、各种应用场景的参考解决方案
home.atlasTwoHundredText: Ascend是基于华为公司自研的人工智能芯片计算平台生态项目，面向开发者提供AI硬件计算平台，包含计算资源、运行框架以及相关配套工具等，让开发者可以便捷高效的编写在特定硬件设备上运行的人工智能应用程序。
home.atlasTwoHundredAIText: Atlas 200是一款高性能低功耗的AI加速模块，外形尺寸只有半张信用卡的大小，耗电量仅为9.5瓦，支持16通道实时高清视频分析，可以部署在摄像头、无人机和机器人等设备上。
home.atlasThreeHundredText: 基于昇腾AI处理器，以标准的半高半长PCIe卡的产品形态，提供多种数据精度，适用于人工智能训练和推理场景（主要是推理）。Atlas 300 AI加速卡采用全新的DaVinci架构，提供业界领先的性能与能效比，可广泛应用于数据中心和智能边缘。
home.atlasFiveHundredText: Atlas 500智能小站是一款性能强大，能在边缘进行实时处理的边缘计算产品，单台可提供16 TOPS INT8的处理能力，同时功耗极低。Atlas 500集成了WIFI和LTE两种无线数据接口，提供灵活的网络接入和数据传输方案。
home.collegesSub: 助力高校人工智能学科建设，培养产业转型和创新发展所需要的新工科人才。
home.developerSub: 耕耘AI梦想、实践AI创新，打造全行业、全场景AI解决方案，构建万物互联的智能世界。
home.newSub: 华为Atlas人工智能计算平台正式上市
home.mayTitle: 华为Atlas人工智能开发者大赛正式启动
home.mayConter: [中国，苏州，2019年5月10日] 华为在智能计算大会苏州会场宣布，正式启动2019华为Atlas人工智能开发者大赛。作为华为赋能开发者系列计划的重要组成部分，此次大赛面向全球具有创新精神的开发者展开，旨在为开发者提供最好的创新实践舞台。
home.juneTitle: 金域医学携手华为云，AI辅助宫颈癌筛查技术获突破性进展
home.juneConter: [中国，广州，2019年6月11日] 金域医学与华为云在2019中国生物产业大会上联合宣布，双方在人工智能（AI）辅助病理诊断应用开发方面取得突破性进展。金域医学病理专家团队与华为云AI团队合作，首次基于病理形态学，通过深度学习技术，训练出精准、高效的AI辅助宫颈癌筛查模型。该模型在排阴率高于60%的基础上，阴性片判读的正确率高于99%，同时，阳性病变的检出率超过99.9%。这是目前国际上已公布的AI辅助宫颈癌筛查的最高水平。通常情况下，细胞病理医生镜下阅读宫颈细胞涂片，平均每例要花费6分钟，而AI识别仅需36秒，通过AI辅助宫颈癌筛查模型判读速度是人工判读的10倍。
home.aprilTitle: 华为Atlas人工智能计算平台正式上市
home.aprilConter: [中国，深圳，2019年4月11日] 华为宣布Atlas人工智能计算平台系列产品正式上市，开启了Atlas商用新篇章。

newsList.newsTitle: 华为为黎巴嫩引入最新5G技术
newsList.newsContent: [黎巴嫩,贝鲁特,2018年11月6日]黎巴嫩领先的移动通信和数据运营商touch最近利用华为的最新5G设备在该国进行了首个5G商业测试。

sellProductList.sellProductContent: 华为Atlas 200 DK AI开发者套件是以昇腾310处理器为核心的一个开发者板形态产品，帮助AI应用的开发者快速熟悉开发环境。其主要功能是将昇腾310处理器的核心功能通过该板上的外围接口开放出来，方便用户快速简捷的接入并使用昇腾310处理器强大的处理能力。
Atlas 200是一款高性能低功耗的AI加速模块，外形尺寸只有半张信用卡的大小，耗电量仅为9.5瓦，支持16通道实时高清视频分析，可以部署在摄像头、无人机和机器人等设备上。
基于昇腾AI处理器，以标准的半高半长PCIe卡的产品形态，提供多种数据精度，适用于人工智能训练和推理场景（主要是推理）。Atlas 300 AI加速卡采用全新的DaVinci架构，提供业界领先的性能与能效比，可广泛应用于数据中心和智能边缘。
Atlas 500智能小站是一款性能强大，能在边缘进行实时处理的边缘计算产品，单台可提供16 TOPS INT8的处理能力，同时功耗极低。Atlas 500集成了WIFI和LTE两种无线数据接口，提供灵活的网络接入和数据传输方案。

application.title: 人脸检测
application.describe: 检测摄像捕获视频中的人脸，对于检测到的每张人脸返回其人脸坐标及相应的置信度。

application.describe: 捕获摄像头中的人脸，与系统中已注册的人脸进行比对并预测出最可能的用户实时显示。

application.describe: 检测出视频中的车辆，并进一步对车辆的型号、车辆的颜色以及车牌进行识别。

application.author: Ascend

about.title: 开发者支持
about.explain: 华为首款基于全新自研的AI处理器开源能力套件
about.subject: Ascend简介
about.introduce: 2018年10月10日，华为正式发布全栈全场景AI解决方案。全栈，意味着为广大AI应用开发者提供强大、经济的算力，低门槛的应用开发平台，实现AI数据建模、模型训练、应用开发更加简单、敏捷、高效。全场景，意味着让智能无所不及，覆盖端、边、云任何商业场景。
about.introducea: 全栈全场景AI解决方案的昇腾310芯片是业界面向边缘计算场景最强算力的AI SoC。当前最典型的几种边缘计算场景是安防、自动驾驶和智能制造。 无论哪一种边缘计算场景，都对空间、功耗、算力提出了苛刻的约束条件。一颗昇腾310芯片可以实现高达16TOPS的现场算力，支持同时识别包括人、车、障碍物、交通标示在内的200个不同的物体；一秒钟内可处理上千张图片。无论是在急速行驶的汽车上，还是在高速运转的生产线上。无论是复杂的科学研究，还是日常的教育活动，昇腾310可以为各行各业提供触手可及的高效算力。10月华为联合奥迪展示了L4级无人驾驶的路测，汽车上配备了华为的MDC车载计算单元。根据测算，支持L4级无人驾驶这样非常复杂 的边缘计算场景时，310芯片组一共也仅消耗200瓦的能耗。
about.introduceb: 昇腾系列AI芯片的另外一个独特优势是采用了华为开创性的统一、可扩展的架构，即“达芬奇架构”，它实现了从极致的低功耗到极致的大算力场景的全覆盖，市场上还没有其它架构能做到。“达芬奇架构”能一次开发适用于所有场景的部署、迁移和协同，大大提升了软件开发的效率，加速AI在各行业的切实应用。
about.forumex: 向其他开发者分享资讯，针对各种开放服务能力提出疑问，并与其他开发者分享技术资讯。
about.newsex: 您可以在此获取基于华为昇腾系列AI处理器的相关文档。帮助您了解华为昇腾系列AI处理器软硬件，并进行人工智能应用的开发。
about.videoex: 昇腾学院提供AI领域的实践培训，开发者、研究人员和院校师生可以获取和丰富华为昇腾AI处理器的开发和实践经验。

home.integrateTitle: One-Stop Integrated Development Environment Mind Studio
home.integrateText: Mind Studio is an AI full-stack development platform based on Huawei Ascend AI processor. It enables the development of custom operators, and provides features such as network migration, optimization, and analysis at the network layer. It provides AI engine orchestration in drag-and-drop mode at the service engine layer and a collection of high-performance operator libraries, greatly reducing the complexity of AI app development.
home.help: Reduces development complexity and operation costs and speeds up app go-to-market.
home.built: Provides ample high-performance operator libraries and handy tools for debugging, optimization, and deployment.
home.structure: Builds reference solutions across industries and application scenarios.
home.atlasTwoHundredText: Huawei Ascend is an artificial intelligence (AI) chipset computing platform. This platform provides computing resources, running frameworks, and necessary tools, allowing convenient and efficient AI app craft for specific hardware devices.
home.atlasTwoHundredAIText: Packaged in a form factor half the size of a credit card, the Atlas 200 AI’s power consumption is as low as 9.5 Watts while supporting 16-channel real-time HD video analytics. This high-performance, low-power product can be deployed on devices such as cameras, drones, and robots.
home.atlasThreeHundredText: Based on the Ascend AI processor, the Atlas 300 AI accelerator card is packaged in a standard half-height, half-length PCIe card form factor. It supports multiple types of data precision and is suitable for AI training and inference scenarios (mainly inference). The Atlas 300 AI accelerator card uses a groundbreaking Da Vinci architecture to unlock industry-leading performance and energy efficiency. It can be widely used for data centers and the intelligent edge.
home.atlasFiveHundredText: Unlocking powerful performance, the Atlas 500 AI Edge Station is designed for real-time data processing at the edge. A single device can provide 16 TOPS of INT8 processing capability with ultra-low power consumption. The Atlas 500 AI integrates Wi-Fi and LTE wireless data interfaces to support flexible network access and data transmission schemes.

home.developerSub: Fueling AI innovation and bringing AI solutions to all industries and scenarios for a fully connected, intelligent world

sellProductList.sellProductContent: Powered by the Huawei Ascend 310 processor, the Atlas 200 DK AI Developer Kit helps AI application developers quickly get familiar with the development environment. The device provides external ports for developers to quickly and easily access and use the powerful processing capability of the Ascend 310 processor.

Packaged in a form factor half the size of a credit card, the Atlas 200 AI’s power consumption is as low as 9.5 Watts while supporting 16-channel real-time HD video analytics. This high-performance, low-power product can be deployed on devices such as cameras, drones, and robots.

Based on the Ascend AI processor, the Atlas 300 AI accelerator card is packaged in a standard half-height, half-length PCIe card form factor. It supports multiple types of data precision and is suitable for AI training and inference scenarios (mainly inference). The Atlas 300 AI accelerator card uses a groundbreaking Da Vinci architecture to unlock industry-leading performance and energy efficiency. It can be widely used for data centers and the intelligent edge.

Unlocking powerful performance, the Atlas 500 AI Edge Station is designed for real-time data processing at the edge. A single device can provide 16 TOPS of INT8 processing capability with ultra-low power consumption. The Atlas 500 AI integrates Wi-Fi and LTE wireless data interfaces to support flexible network access and data transmission schemes.

application.title: Face Detection
application.describe: Detects faces in videos captured by cameras and returns the face coordinates and confidence of each detected face.
application.author: Ascend

application.title: Facial Recognition
application.describe: Compares faces captured by cameras with those registered in the system, predicts the most likely user, and returns the prediction result for real time display.
application.author: Ascend

application.title: Vehicle Detection
application.describe: Detects vehicles in videos, and further identifies vehicle brands, vehicle colors, and vehicle license plates.
application.author: Ascend

application.title: Human Detection
application.describe: Detects human bodies in videos, and further identifies the human body characteristics including the genders, ages, clothing colors, and accessories.
application.author: Ascend

about.title: Developer Support
about.explain: Ascend DK is Huawei's first open source capability kit based on proprietary AI processors.
about.subject: About Ascend
about.introduce: On October 10, 2018, Huawei unveiled the full-stack all-scenario AI solution. Full stack means the outstanding, cost-effective computing power and low-barrier application development platform to AI application developers. This platform implements AI data modeling and model training, making application development simpler, more agile, and more efficient. All scenarios mean ubiquitous intelligence in all commercial scenarios across device, edge, and cloud.
about.introducea: Ascend 310 of the full-stack all-scenario AI solution is the industry's most powerful AI chipset in terms of edge computing. Currently, the most typical edge computing scenarios are security, self-driving, and intelligent manufacturing. All these scenarios pose strict constraints on space, power consumption, and computing power. A single Ascend 310 chipset provides up to 16 TOPS onsite computing power, supports simultaneous identification of 200 different objects including people, vehicles, obstacles, and traffic signs, and processes thousands of images within just one second. From speeding cars to fast-running production lines and from complex scientific researches to daily educational activities, Ascend 310 is capable of providing convenient, efficient computing power. In October of 2018, Huawei collaborated with Audi to carry out the level 4 autonomous driving test. The tested car was equipped with Huawei's MDC vehicle-mounted computing unit. According to the test result, Ascend 310 uses only 200 W power in such a complex edge computing scenario.
about.introduceb: Another unmatched advantage of Ascend series AI chipsets is that they use Huawei's the innovative, scalable Da Vinci architecture, which is the industry’s first to fully cover scenarios from extreme low power consumption to ultimate big computing power. The Da Vinci architecture allows development of deployment, migration, and collaboration at a time for all scenarios, greatly improving the software development efficiency and accelerating AI application in various industries.
about.forumex: Find answers to your questions, and offer your support and advice to other developers.
about.newsex: Browse documentation about Huawei's Ascend AI processors to facilitate your development of AI apps.
about.videoex: Explore the AI educational resources and build your first Ascend project from the ground up with Huawei Ascend processors.
about.we: ，We will reply to you as soon as possible.

activity.titlebottom: Meet fellow developers and Huawei engineers, attend talks on a wide range of AI topics, and share innovative ideas and best practices.
